doc:
Nick Stahl https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nick_Stahl 0 Nicolas Kent Stahl (born December 5, 1979) is an American actor known for The Man Without a Face, Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines and Carnivàle. Starting out as a child actor, he gained recognition for his performance in the 1993 film The Man Without a Face co-starring Mel Gibson and then embarked on a successful career. He later transitioned into his adult career with roles in the film The Thin Red Line, In the Bedroom, Bully, Sin City, the HBO series Carnivàle, and the film Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines, in the role of John Connor with Arnold Schwarzenegger. More recently, he also starred in the films Mirrors 2, Afghan Luke, and Away from Here. Nicolas_Kent_Stahl ( born December_5_,_1979 ) is an_American_actor known for The_Man Without a_Face_,_Terminator_3 : Rise of the_Machines and Carnivàle . Starting out as a_child_actor , he gained recognition for his_performance in the_1993_film The_Man Without a_Face_co-starring_Mel_Gibson and then embarked on a_successful_career . He later transitioned into his_adult_career with roles in the_film The_Thin_Red_Line , In the_Bedroom , Bully , Sin_City , the_HBO_series_Carnivàle , and the_film Terminator_3 : Rise of the_Machines , in the_role of John_Connor with Arnold_Schwarzenegger . More_recently , he also starred in the_films Mirrors 2 , Afghan_Luke , and Away_from_Here .
